thread.section_title: New York Headlines - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-
thread.title: 2 Long Island men accused of sexually exploiting minor
thread.title_full: 2 Long Island men accused of sexually exploiting minor - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: 2 Long Island men accused of sexually exploiting minor
text:
CENTRAL ISLIP, N.Y. (AP) - Authorities say two men have been arrested for allegedly conspiring to have a 16-year-old girl engage in prostitution.
They say Kevin Slackford, of Centereach, and Jose Donnelly, who they described as homeless, are among some 150 people arrested in recent days as part of a nationwide crackdown on sexual exploitation of children.
The two suspects also face a child pornography charge for allegedly emailing a sexually explicit picture of a minor.
Slackford and Donnelly were not required to enter a plea at their arraignment Thursday. They're being held without bail.
Newsday ( http://nwsdy.li/1jGpm3G ) says their attorneys declined to comment after the arraignment.
The victim was returned to her family after a probe by the FBI and Nassau police.
Information from: Newsday, http://www.newsday.com
